Articles.Content:
Hi everyone !

After a break , & just beggin with the last update of our favorite space game ^^ Yeah , KSP of cource !

So , this is just an update of my lovely short range SSTO

78 Parts , 26 Tons , 81.486 Kold , 1 R.A.P.I.E.R , 2 Turbojet .

Include KER Nav , Kethane scanner , small converter & drill with 2 small kethane tank ! ( use Kethane 0.8.8.1 the only version work for me )

Abort : Toggle Ladder

1 - Toggle Drill

2 - Toggle converter

8 - R.A.P.I.E.R Switch Mode

9 - Toggle Panels

0 - Toggle techs (8 basic techs )

SSTO-240-TX3-K

SSTO-240-TX3-K : https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1265&authkey=!AE0cbby8EAhZt2M&ithint=file%2ccraft

If you want the Stock version ! Swap color green to grey ! ( ofc they looking same without KerPaint )

SSTO-240-TX3-S : https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1264&authkey=!AEELRdZZg_nvHPk&ithint=file%2ccraft

I suggest to refuel on Minmus berfore traveling .

Hope you enjoy them , CYA

Edited January 28, 2015 by ZLM-Master

I like this plane.

And I'm fully aware I jump bumped an old post.

Get your titting self over it.
